card.name: Convergent Future
card.text: When you cast your first spell on your turn, you may choose another card from your hand with the same mana value. If you do, exile it. Put a number of time counters on it equal to 1/3 of its mana value, rounded up. If it did not have suspend, it gains suspend.

card.name: Time Paradox
card.text: It you cast Time Paradox from your hand, you lose the game. Deal 4 damage to target creature. Exile Time Paradox, then roll a d4. Put that many time counters on it. Suspend 3 - {U}{R}

card.name: Marvin, Timewalker
card.text: 2: Choose target permanent or suspended card. If that permanent or card has a time counter on it, you may remove or put a time counter on it.

card.name: Time Ravage
card.text: Exile all nonland permanents and put time counters on them equal to the number of permanents exiled this way. They gain suspend.

card.name: Time Loop
card.text:
As you cast this spell, choose an instant or sorcery card name not named Time Loop.
Spells you cast with the chosen name gain suspend and "Exile this spell with three time counters on it."
Exile Time Loop.

card.name: Reality Break
card.text: Reality Break enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice. At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a d4. Reroll the d4 if an effect has happened once. Exile Reality Break once all effects have occurred. - • 1 | Tap all creatures that you control. • 2 | All creatures you control take 8 damage. • 3 | Other nonland permanents you control are exiled with one time counter and gains suspend. • 4 | Creatures you control get -10/-0 until your next turn.

card.name: Gift of Alacrity
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Momentary Stasis
card.text: Exile and put two time counters on target spell you don't control. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. Overload {1}{U}{R}

card.name: Tagus, The Merciful
card.text: Flying When Tagus, The Merciful dies, return it to its owner's hand. Your other creatures get +0/+1. {W}{U}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Tagus, Chaotic Spellslinger
card.text:
Flying
Spells you cast cannot share any colors with spells you've cast earlier in the turn. When you cast a spell, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Copied permanent spells are tokens.)

card.name: Wandering Soul
card.text:
Defender
If a creature is blocked by Wandering Soul, the controller of the creature gains control of Wandering Soul. Wandering Soul gains a wandering counter.
{X}: Wandering Soul deals X damage to its controller, where X is the amount of wandering counters.

card.name: Lost Soul
card.text:
Defender
If a creature is blocked by Lost Soul, the controller of the creature gains control of Lost Soul.
{X}: Return Lost Soul to its owner, where X is the number of times this ability has been used. This ability can be used by anyone.

card.name: Time Control
card.text: Destroy all nonland permanents. Exile every card from every graveyard. Place a time counter on every sorcery and instant spell exiled this way. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. You may pay {2} less for cards suspended this way.

card.name: Chronal Shift
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target spell. • Return target creature that died this turn to the battlefield.

card.name: Time Travel
card.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owner's hand.

card.name: Maximillian's Earthern Ball Crusher
card.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature cannot attack.

card.name: Scorching Ray
card.text: Deal 3 damage to 3 different creatures.

card.name: Telekinetic
card.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
You may pay {1} more than the last time to recast this spell from the graveyard.

card.name: Flanders Fields
card.text:
When a Soldier you control dies, put a memoriam counter on Flanders Fields.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool. Activate only if Flanders Fields has at least 5 memoriam counters.

card.name: Nikon, Unending Flame
card.text: 1: Grant mentor to a target creature with 4 power or more.

card.name: Nikolas, Smouldering Flame
card.text: As long as you control other creatures, Nikolas, Smouldering Flame cannot attack or block. All other creatures get +1/+1. At each end step, if a creature you controlled died this turn and you control no creatures other than Nikolas, Smouldering Flame, Nikolas, Smouldering Flame deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Nikon, Nascent Flame
card.text: Partner with Francois, Old Guard {W}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat. If Francois, Old Guard is killed while Nikon, Nascent Flame is tapped, untap Nikon, Nascent Flame.

card.name: Cum
card.text: Target gains 3 life.

card.name: Piss
card.text: Target loses 3 life.

card.name: Pythagoras' Conjecture
card.text: Let Y be the number of sorceries and instants you have casted this turn. Deal Z damage a target creature, rounded up, where Z × Z = X × X + Y × Y.

card.name: Nikolas, Nascent Spark
card.text: 1: Grant vigilance a target creature with 3 power or less.

card.name: Godfrey, Conqueror of Fields
card.text: 1: Create a 1/1 red Soldier token named "Conscript". You may attach an Equipment you control to it.

card.name: Godfrey, Extradimensional Tinkerer
card.text: 1: Create a colorless artifact token named "F1 Grenade" with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact and it deals 3 damage to you." Target player gains control of F1 Grenade.

card.name: Francois, Old Guard
card.text: Partner with Nikon, Nascent Flame {R}: Tap Nikon, Nascent Flame. Francois, Old Guard gains +3/+1 and trample for a turn and is goaded. If Francois, Old Guard dies while Nikon, Nascent Flame is tapped, deal 4 damage to any creature.

card.name: Marvin, Paragon of Time
card.text: Haste Whenever you cast a sorcery or an instant, you may pay {2} less for its mana cost. Exile and put one time counter on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.

card.name: Minho, Bringer of Light
card.text: Flash, Flying, Defender. When Minho, Bringer of Light enters the battlefield, all nonland permanents phase out.

card.name: John, Slayer of Gods
card.text: Deathtouch. When John, Slayer of Gods is blocked by or blocking a creature with indestructible, that creature loses indestructible till end of turn. Put five +1/+1 counters on John, Slayer of Gods.

card.name: Crash.exe
card.text: Replicate {U} Tap target creature.

card.name: Tagus, The Determined
card.text: Flying For each permanent your spells destroy or exile, Tagus gains +1/+1 until the end of your next turn.

card.name: John, Arcana Unleashed
card.text: 1: For each unique token you control, deal 1 damage to a target creature.
